mapper.sql: project_source d LEFT JOIN dataset_import di ON d.import_attempt=di.attempt AND d.key=di.dataset_key
mapper.select:
WITH src AS ( SELECT s.subject_dataset_key AS key, max(s.dataset_import_attempt) AS attempt, d.import_attempt AS curr_attempt FROM sector s JOIN dataset d ON d.key=s.subject_dataset_key WHERE s.dataset_key=#{datasetKey} GROUP BY s.subject_dataset_key, d.import_attempt )
SELECT #{datasetKey} AS dataset_key, FROM src, WHERE src.key=d.key AND src.attempt=src.curr_attempt
UNION
SELECT #{datasetKey} AS dataset_key, FROM src, WHERE d.key=src.key AND d.dataset_key IS NULL AND d.import_attempt=src.attempt AND src.attempt!=src.curr_attempt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_source (key, dataset_key, import_attempt, , source_key, origin, created, modified) VALUES (#{key}, #{datasetKey}, #{importAttempt}, , #{sourceKey}, #{origin}::DATASETORIGIN, now(), now())
